First Round Group A location Matches Group (A) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=175|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !width=20|GD !width=20|Pts |- bgcolor=ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| |2||2||0||0||2||0||+2||4 |- bgcolor=ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| |2||1||0||1||4||3||+1||2 |- |style="text-align:left;"| |2||0||0||2||2||5||−3||0 |} Group (B) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=175|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !width=20|GD !width=20|Pts |- bgcolor=ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| |2||2||0||0||12||1||+11||4 |- bgcolor=ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| |2||1||0||1||5||7||−2||2 |- |style="text- align:left;"| |2||0||0||2||1||10||−9||0 |} Semi-finals - 1 Semi-finals - 2 Finals ***BURMA qualify. \- - - - === Group 3 === This group was initially scheduled to be played at Tehran but, due to problems obtaining visas from the Iranian authorities, FIFA rescheduled the group as a series of knockout ties. title: Football at the 1972 Summer Olympics – Men's Asian Qualifiers
